title: Job Immersion and Transformational Leadership Development Program for Mathematical Problem Solving

context.additional_context: Solving complex mathematical problems in digital device-enabled collaborative environments while simultaneously developing job immersion and leadership competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more transformational leadership techniques to leverage team members' potential during mathematical problem-solving
Learners can enhance job immersion by 20%+ through informal learning experiences acquired via project-based learning
Learners evaluate sustained engagement with mathematical challenges by designing feedback routines to strengthen self-efficacy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
